abilities.title: Glowing Aura
abilities.description: The Luminawing can emit a radiant aura that repels predators and attracts prey.

abilities.title: Aerial Agility
abilities.description: The Luminawing is incredibly agile in flight, able to dodge attacks with ease.

relatedLegends.title: The Song of the Luminawing
relatedLegends.source: Ancient Chronicles of the Aurora Isles
